name: Explosive dice
description:
You have 15 turn to beat your high score on this dice game! Each turn, the sum of all of the dices are added to your current score. 

Click where you want to throw a dice. The next dice faces can be seen in the top left corner. The dices interact with each other,  so try to throw dices with a lot of "Boom" faces near dices which could have more value.

Note: Game made for the GMTK 2022 Game jam. There are some known bugs, that's why there is a reset button. As it is my first game, all comments are welcome :-)
